alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Washington (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 2:02AM EST until February 19 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio... Muskingum River At McConnelsville affecting Washington and Morgan Counties. For the Muskingum River...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Muskingum River At McConnelsville. * WHEN...From early this morning to late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Many areas are flooded in and around McConnelsville. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 AM EST Friday the stage was 11.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to crest through this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Report flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 800 401 9535, when you can do so safely. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rlx. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 200 PM EST.
